modName: gatti Bondage Type 1 Reinare CBBE (AND UUNP) HDT Bodyslide Conversion
summary: a CBBE HDT Bodyslide conversion of the Reinare light armour originally published by gatti2012, with the NEWLY ADDED pleasure of UUNP
descriptionHtml:
This mod was originally released by gatti2012 and though it didn't include HDT or Bodyslide support was quite popular and sports just over 27 000 downloads.

I'm still learning the ropes as a noob modder, I hope that the practice i get with these conversions (this is my second one), so graciously allowed by the original authors, I will one-day release big and popular mods of my own.

Hopefully soon.

 ( Funny enough, this was gatti's second mod as well)

For now, I hope that this small mod gives u hours of bug free enjoyment.

********* Especially now that i've added a UUNP conversion as well. Full weight slider and bodyslide support.

* Be WARNED contains nudity and is for adults only

* Does not support beast races, however my character( Valiin Stormbolt) is an Altmer, and I experienced no problems. If it also works with Bosmer/ Orsimer, pls let me know. My UUNP character however is a Nord, but same applies.

* Craft-able in "LEATHER" Category ( Due to my mods mine shows up in the "Draugr category"  just look around or hit the console. 

* Can be improved at the work bench

* Can be enchanted

GIMME SOME SCREENIES, I WANNA SEE YOUR GIRLS USIN IT

** Currently learning more about blender and so on, want to turn this into a modular armour with at least 7 parts. ( might take a while, but i'll get there) not there yet  :(

*** PS Remember to endorse if u like the mod

**** I'm going to step away from CBBE for a while back to UUNP so you might see UUNP conversions soon, now working on my jewelry conversion 

* A LITTLE OFF TOPIC: I RECENTLY INSTALLED A RATHER SYSTEM TAXING MOD THAT MADE IT ALMOST IMPOSSIBLE FOR ME TO PLAY MY GAME. EVEN WHEN I ONLY THOUGHT OF TOUCHING MY KEYBOARD CTD, UPON CTD UPON CTD. I HAD MY GAME BY THE SHORT HAIR READY TO SHOOT IT IN THE FACE WHEN I FOUND THIS ( https://youtu.be/kdar8cIGd24 ) I HOPE YOU WILL FIND IT AS USEFUL AS I DO. NOW I RUN AT ULTRA SETTINGS WITH ENB AND VIVID WEATHER ISTALLED WITH HARDLY A STUTTER. NO CTD AT ALL FOR ALMOST 11 HOURS OF PLAY TIME. GAME ON!

PPS I have identified a little clipping behind the knee at times, and will fix and update as soon as i have time. Real life u know. Still pending ........
author: vossie69
